title: Add shareable app link + nav Share action

requirements.summary: Create a frontend utility to build the app’s share URL (main entry route) using hash-based routing and reuse the existing clipboard helper.
acceptanceCriteria: A utility function exists that returns a string URL for sharing the app home (uses `window.location.origin` and `/#/`).
Copy-to-clipboard uses the existing `copyToClipboard` fallback implementation (no new clipboard implementation introduced).

file_operations.description: Add a small utility that builds the app share URL pointing to the main entry route using the current hash-based convention (e.g., `window.location.origin + '/#/'`). Also export a helper that copies this URL by calling the existing `copyToClipboard` from `frontend/src/utils/inviteLinks.ts` (reuse its fallback behavior; do not introduce a new clipboard implementation).

requirements.summary: Add an always-available “Share” action in the authenticated app navigation that copies the app share URL and shows success/failure toasts.
acceptanceCriteria: Authenticated users can trigger a “Share” action from the app navigation/shell UI.
Triggering the action copies the app share URL to the clipboard.
A success toast is shown on successful copy and an error toast is shown if copy fails.
All user-facing text for this feature is in English.

file_operations.description: Add a user-facing “Share” action in the top navigation (always visible in the authenticated app shell). Wire it to the new app share-link utility to copy the app URL to the clipboard and use the existing `sonner` toast pattern to confirm outcomes with English text (success: “App link copied”, failure: “Failed to copy link”).
